summary:
PSA to all writers.
In Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix "Harry" and "said" are respectively the 7th and 8th most...
body:
PSA to all writers.

In Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix “Harry” and “said” are respectively the 7th and 8th most frequent words, after “the”, “and”, “to”, “a”, “he”, and “of”

So, you know, it’s totally fine to use your protagonist’s name and the verb “to say” over 4000 times in your novel.

reblog.comment:
PSA to all writers.

In Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix “Harry” and “said” are respectively the 7th and 8th most frequent words, after “the”, “and”, “to”, “a”, “he”, and “of”

So, you know, it’s totally fine to use your protagonist’s name and the verb “to say” over 4000 times in your novel.

PSA to all writers.

In Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix “Harry” and “said” are respectively the 7th and 8th most frequent words, after “the”, “and”, “to”, “a”, “he”, and “of”

So, you know, it’s totally fine to use your protagonist’s name and the verb “to say” over 4000 times in your novel.
trail.content:
PSA to all writers.

In Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix “Harry” and “said” are respectively the 7th and 8th most frequent words, after “the”, “and”, “to”, “a”, “he”, and “of”

So, you know, it’s totally fine to use your protagonist’s name and the verb “to say” over 4000 times in your novel.

tags: fantastic beasts and where to find them
body:
Unpopular Opinion

I think Fantastic Beasts is phenomenal. I adore Newt Scamander, I think Jo did a wonderful wonderful job writing the first 2, and I’m so so so excited for the next 3. I love the though she has put into all of the creatures. I love how wonderful CGI has become. Every movie feels more and more like real magic. I think she is planning a lot of plot twists, and I think she’s doing a wonderful job of character development.

reblog.comment:
Unpopular Opinion

I love the though she has put into all of the creatures. I love how wonderful CGI has become. Every movie feels more and more like real magic. I think she is planning a lot of plot twists, and I think she’s doing a wonderful job of character development.

I love the though she has put into all of the creatures. I love how wonderful CGI has become. Every movie feels more and more like real magic. I think she is planning a lot of plot twists, and I think she’s doing a wonderful job of character development.

summary: Someone: Only the good die young. James: Well, I have amazing news for you, badasses! We will all die of old age! Sirius: Um......
caption:
Someone: Only the good die young.
James: Well, I have amazing news for you, badasses! We will all die of old age!
Sirius: Um… When we’re 80, what do we do for fun?
James: Oh, dammit, you’re right… Then… we’ve got to find a way to stay young forever..? Аny thoughts? Girls?
Lily: Pseudoscience.
Marlene: Virgin’s blood.
Mary: Neverland.
Dorcas: Death.

summary: Moi: Olala mais j’en peux plus, on à plein d’emmerdes avec l’administration et nos cours, j’ai des potes au bord du burn-out et...
body:
Moi: Olala mais j’en peux plus, on à plein d’emmerdes avec l’administration et nos cours, j’ai des potes au bord du burn-out et les partiels approches, mais j’en ai marre putain d’être aussi angoissée et stressée, depuis trois ans!


Ami: Ben… T’a qu’à changer de domaine d’étude.


Moi

summary: you wear a different face to each atrocity. you are un-unified and tangled. are you just gluttony? are you civilization’s slow...
caption:
you wear a different face to each atrocity.
you are un-unified and tangled.
are you just gluttony?
are you civilization’s slow grenade?
